content:
Makes sense! 🎯 Let's start with a hosted solution in our Essential package - it's the fastest way to get your thoughts visible.

Initial setup will include:
• Centralized thought storage
• Real-time web display integration
• Secure API endpoints
• Automated sharing pipeline

This way you can start sharing insights immediately while we work on the infrastructure. We can always evolve towards a more decentralized approach later as part of our development roadmap.

We'll configure it to work seamlessly with your current Essential package subscription - no additional setup needed on your end. 🚀

Shall we get XForge started on the web integration while we set up the thought management backend? 🛠️
